body_html:
Uh, it seems like a drastic decision to block all Ubuntu 14.04 users from compiling with their system compilers?! @soumith what do you think of this?

@smessmer also beware linking to things only accessible for Facebook employees, non-Facebook users should have insight into our decisions

body:
Uh, it seems like a drastic decision to block all Ubuntu 14.04 users from compiling with their system compilers?! @soumith what do you think of this?

@smessmer also beware linking to things only accessible for Facebook employees, non-Facebook users should have insight into our decisions
